exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros a b c. split. - intros H. destruct (BinNat.N.mod_divides b a) as [x Hx]. destruct (BinNat.N.mod_divides c a) as [y Hy]. exists x, y. split. + destruct Hx as [Hb _]. rewrite Hb. reflexivity. + split. * destruct Hy as [Hc _]. rewrite Hc. reflexivity. * split. ++ destruct Hx as [_ [H1 _]]. apply H1. ++ split. ** destruct Hx as [_ [_ [H2 _]]]. apply H2. ** destruct Hy as [_ [_ _ [H3 _]]]. apply H3. - intros [x [y [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]]]. apply Nat.mod_divides. + intros contra. discriminate contra. + exists x. rewrite H1, H2. reflexivity.
